title: NMDA receptor remodeling and nNOS activation in mice after unilateral striatal injury with 6-OHDA
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Michele Barboza de Carvalho, Bruna Teixeira-Silva, Suelen Adriani Marques, Andrea Alice Silva, Marcelo Cossenza, Adriana da Cunha Faria-Melibeu, Claudio Alberto Serfaty, Paula Campello-Costa
